name: bots!!
description:
oh no!!

your space station is being invaded by deadly robots!!

use your mechanical prowess to create and join guns together to make them strong!!

destroy them all!!

and have fun!!

mechanical prowess:

while holding a constructed gun, bring the sides that you want to connect next to each other and press q to join them. if the front is facing another gun, it will power up the second gun and vice-versa.

press ESC to pause

by Team CAI (me)!!

Made for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021: Joined Together.
